entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers this evening and after midnight. Rain beginning after midnight. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Rain. Temperature steady near plus 5.
entry.summary: Rain ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late in the afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 29 December 2022
